amendment.description: To modify limitations on assistance under the American Servicemembers' Protection Act of 2002.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4284 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4284 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5934) To modify limitations on assistance under the American Servicemembers' Protection Act of 2002.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4284 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4284 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
